education.institution: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology - HUTECH

aboutMe: I love making cool apps for myself and others. I m also a big fan of football, especially Manchester United, and I enjoy watching anime like One Piece. I m a creative person who enjoys both tech and fun hobbies.

description: - Developed a logistics system featuring a specialized quoting app for a US client. Collaborated with customers and analysts to plan and implement new features.
- Built a microservices architecture using C#, .NET Core, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, SNS, SQS, GraphQL, Hangfire, Splunk, and New Relic. Followed Gitflow for code management and hosted the system on AWS.
- Implemented Agile methodology and utilized Rally for effective project management.
Practice and research in depth about C# and .NET framework.
Adapt at the software development process and project execution for fresher management system.
Be training strong soft skills, including effective presentation and English.

experiences.company: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology - HUTECH
description: Taught freshman students about programming basics and techniques in C/C++ programming

projects.name: Nobita app - Fast Money Transfer App
projects.school: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology - HUTECH
description: - Fast money transfer app that integrates online lucky money service and increases security by block chain. The app implement all api provided by HDBank
- Nobita use flutter to build app, back-end is .net core and sql server, this project won first prize HDBank hackthon competition

projects.name: Owl trust - Fake news filter
projects.school: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology - HUTECH
description: - Reading news app help user access reliable news. Reliability is based on belief points and calculated by Majority Decision algorithm
- Owl trust use flutter to build app, back-end is .net core and sql server

achievement: - Top 3 GPA in K20 HUTECH Talent Scholarship in 2020
- Top 1 GPA in K20 HUTECH Talent Scholarship  in 2021
- First prize in It got talent contest at Hutech University
